page.title: 11Spernall-Leisure activities
page.content:
The following are leisure activities enjoyed by the people of the Spernall area: Walking dogs Going to a pub Television Eating out Listening to music Reading Listening to radio Embroidery Gardening Tending pets Cooking Crosswords Piano playing Knitting Musical instruments Car trips Disco dancing Keep fit Brownies Guides Womens Institute Cubs Auction sales Voluntary work Playing with Lego Bee keeping Home decoration Skittles Working mens club Photography Visiting family and friends
More leisure activities on page 12.
